children.label: TSFFieldInfo
TSFText
children.value:
<form.Field
  name="${1:fieldname}"
  validators={{
    onChange: v.pipe(
      v.string("Your email must be a string"),
      v.minLength(1, "Please enter your email"),
      v.email("The email address is badly formatted"),
      v.maxLength(100, "Email address is too long"),
      v.regex(/[a-z]/, "Your password must contain a lowercase letter"),
      v.trim()
    ),
  }}
  children={(field) => (
    <Input
      value={field().state.value}
      label="${2:label}"
      type="${3|text,tel,url,number,email,password|}"
      name={field().name}
      id={field().name}
      placeholder="${4:placeholder}"
      iconname="${5|search,password,email,user|}"
      disabled={field().form.state.isSubmitting}
      ${6:required}
      onBlur={field().handleBlur}
      onInput={(e) => field().handleChange(e.target.value)}
      status={
        field().state.meta.errors.length > 0
          ? "error"
          : field().state.value !== undefined &&
            field().state.value !== null &&
            field().state.value
          ? "ok"
          : ""
      }
    >
      <FieldInfo field={field()} />
    </Input>
  )}
/>

children.label: TSFCheckbox
children.value: ( ${2:I accept the terms and conditions}{" "} View Terms } helper="${3:helper}" color="${4|blue,red,green,purple,teal,yellow,orange|}" ${5:required} name={field().name} id={field().name} disabled={field().form.state.isSubmitting} onBlur={field().handleBlur} checked={field().state.value} onClick={(e) => field().handleChange(e.target.checked)} status={ field().state.meta.errors.length > 0 ? "error" : field().state.value !== undefined && field().state.value !== null && field().state.value ? "ok" : "" } > )} />

children.label: TSFButton
children.value:
<form.Subscribe
    selector={(state) => ({
      canSubmit: state.canSubmit,
      isSubmitting: state.isSubmitting,
    })}
    children={(state) => {
      return (
        <Button
          color="${1|Blue,Alternative,Dark,Light,Green,Red,Yellow,Purple,BlueRound,BlueWhite,BlueColoredShadow,BlueOutline,facebook,twitter,google,link,icon,round|}"
          type="${2|button,submit,reset|}"
          size="${3|esmall,small,base,large,elarge|}"
          disabled={!state().canSubmit}
        >
          {state().isSubmitting ? (
            <>
              <ILoading class="w-4 h-4 text-white me-2" /> Wait..
            </>
          ) : "${4:Button Text}"}
        </Button>
      );
    }}
  />

children.label: TSFStatus
children.value:
({ canSubmit: state.canSubmit, isSubmitting: state.isSubmitting, submitted: state.submitted, submissionAttempts: state.submissionAttempts, isValidating: state.isValidating, isValid: state.isValid, isFieldsValid: state.isFieldsValid, isFieldsValidating: state.isFieldsValidating, isTouched: state.isTouched, isPristine: state.isPristine, isDirty: state.isDirty, })} children={(state) => { return ( <>
Submit Count:{state().submissionAttempts}
Submitting:{state().isSubmitting === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
Submitted:{state().submitted === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
Validating:{state().isValidating === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
Valid:{state().isValid === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
FormValidating: {state().isFormValidating === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
FormValid:{state().isFormValid === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
FieldsValidating: {state().isFieldsValidating === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
FieldsValid: {state().isFieldsValid === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
Touched: {state().isTouched === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
Pristine: {state().isPristine === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
Dirty: {state().isDirty === true ? "Yes" : "No"}
); }} />

children.label: TSFSelect
TSFTextArea
children.value:
<form.Field
  name="${1:name}"
  validators={{
    onChange: v.pipe(
      v.string("Please enter your details"),
      v.minLength(1, "Please enter your details"),
      v.maxLength(100, "Details is too long")
    ),
  }}
  children={(field) => (
    <TextArea
      value={field().state.value}
      label="${2:label}"
      size="${3|vsmall,small,base,large|}"
      id={field().name}
      name={field().name}
      placeholder="${4:placeholder}"
      disabled={field().form.state.isSubmitting}
      ${5:required}
      onBlur={field().handleBlur}
      onInput={(e) => field().handleChange(e.target.value)}
      status={
        field().state.meta.errors.length > 0
          ? "error"
          : field().state.value !== undefined &&
            field().state.value !== null &&
            field().state.value
          ? "ok"
          : ""
      }
    >
      <FieldInfo field={field()} />
    </TextArea>
  )}
/>

children.label: TSFFileinput
children.value:
<form.Field
    name="${1:name}"
    validators={{
      onChange: v.pipe(
        v.file("${10:Please select an image file.}"),
        v.mimeType(
          ["${6|image/jpeg,image/png|}"],
          "${7:Please select a JPEG or PNG file}"
        ),
        v.maxSize(
          ${8:1024 * 1024 * 10},
          "${9:Please select a file smaller than 10 MB}"
        )
      ),
    }}
    children={(field) => (
      <InputFile
        label="${2:label}"
        id={field().name}
        type="${3|file,zone|}"
        ${4:required}
        size="${5|small,base,large|}"
        disabled={field().form.state.isSubmitting}
        accept="${6|image/jpeg,image/png|}"
        onInput={(e) =>
          field().handleChange(
            e.target.files ? e.target.files[0] : undefined
          )
        }
        status={
          field().state.meta.errors.length > 0
            ? "error"
            : field().state.value !== undefined &&
              field().state.value !== null &&
              field().state.value
            ? "ok"
            : ""
        }
      >
        <FieldInfo field={field()} />
      </InputFile>
    )}
  />

children.label: TSFNumberinput
children.value:
<form.Field
    name="${1:name}"
    validators={{
      onChange: v.pipe(
        v.number("Please enter a valid age."),
        v.minValue(${3:0}, "You must be at least 18 years old."),
        v.maxValue(${4:20}, "Please enter a valid age.")
      ),
    }}
    children={(field) => (
      <InputNumber
        value={field().state.value}
        label="${2:label}"
        name={field().name}
        id={field().name}
        min={${3:0}}
        max={${4:20}}
        unit="${5:unit}"
        size="${6|small,_|}"
        disabled={field().form.state.isSubmitting}
        required
        onBlur={field().handleBlur}
        onInput={(e) =>
          field().handleChange(Number(e.target.value))
        }
        status={
          field().state.meta.errors.length > 0
            ? "error"
            : field().state.value !== undefined &&
              field().state.value !== null &&
              field().state.value
            ? "ok"
            : ""
        }
      >
        <FieldInfo field={field()} />
      </InputNumber>
    )}
  />

children.value:
<Button
  color="${1|Blue,Alternative,Dark,Light,Green,Red,Yellow,Purple,BlueRound,BlueWhite,BlueColoredShadow,BlueOutline,facebook,twitter,google,link,icon,round|}"
  size="${2|esmall,small,base,large,elarge|}"

children.label: SJTextInput
children.value:
<Inputs
  id="${1:input-id}"
  type="${2|text,password,email,search,number,tel,url|}"
  size="${3|vsmall,small,base,large|}"
  status="${4|normal,error,ok|}"
  label="${5:Your Label}"
  iconname="${6|search,password,email,user|}"
  class="${7:custom-class}"
  endbtn=${8|true,false|}
  endbtnlabel="${9:Button}"
  endbtnprops={{
    type: "${10:button}",
    onClick: ${11:() => console.log("Clicked")}
  }}
  placeholder="${12:Enter text here}"
  required=${13|true,false|}
  disabled=${14|true,false|}
  readonly=${15|true,false|}
  value="${16:defaultValue}"
  onChange=${17:(e) => console.log("Changed:", e.target.value)}
  onInput=${18:(e) => console.log("Input:", e.target.value)}
  onFocus=${19:(e) => console.log("Focused")}
  onBlur=${20:(e) => console.log("Blurred")}
>
  ${21:Helper or error text here}
</Inputs>

children.label: SJLink
children.value:
<Link
  href=${1:/path/to/somewhere}
  color=${2|Link,Paralink,Blue,Alternative,Dark,Light,Green,Red,Yellow,Purple,BlueRound,BlueWhite,BlueColoredShadow,BlueOutline|}
  target=${3|_self,_blank,_parent,_top|}
  class=${4:custom-class}
  size=${5|base,esmall,small,large,elarge|}
  title=${6:Tooltip text}
  rel=${7:noreferrer}
  disabled={${8|true,false|}}
  onClick={${9:() => {}}}
  onMouseEnter={${10:() => {}}}
  onMouseLeave={${11:() => {}}}
  onFocus={${12:() => {}}}
  onBlur={${13:() => {}}}
>
  ${14:Link Text or Elements}
</Link>

children.label: SJAlert
children.value:
<Alert
  type=${1|info,danger,success,warning,dark|}
  withIcon={${2|true,false|}}
  bordered={${3|true,false|}}
  dismissible={${4|true,false|}}
  title=${5:Alert Title}
  class=${6:custom-class}
  role=${7:alert}
  onDismiss={${8:() => {}}}
>
  ${9:Alert Content}
</Alert>

children.label: SJBadge
children.value:
<Badge
  color=${1|default,dark,red,green,yellow,indigo,purple,pink|}
  size=${2|xs,sm|}
  bordered={${3|true,false|}}
  rounded={${4|true,false|}}
  class=${5:custom-class}
  role=${6:status}
  id=${7:unique-id}
  aria-label=${8:Label}
>
  ${9:Badge Content}
</Badge>

children.label: AstroNewPage
children.value:
---
import Layout from "../../layouts/layout_1_withhandf.astro";
import ${2:JSX Page} from "../../components/features/${3:URL}";
---

<Layout title="${1:Page_Title} | KADA">
  <${2:JSX Page} client:only="solid" />
</Layout>

children.label: VBSelect
children.value:
v.pipe(
	v.string("Must be a valid selection"),
	v.minLength(1, "Please select an option"),
	v.picklist(
		gatewaystatusdata.map((item) => item.value),
	"Invalid selection"
	)
),

children.label: VBIPAddress
children.value:
v.pipe(
	v.string("IP address must be a string"),
	v.minLength(7, "Please enter a valid IP address"), // Minimum length for IP: "0.0.0.0"
	v.maxLength(15, "IP address is too long"), // Max for IPv4: "255.255.255.255"
	v.regex(
		/^(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d{2}|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d{2}|[1-9]?\d)){3}$/,
		"Invalid IP address format"
	),
	v.trim()
),

children.label: VBSting
children.value:
v.pipe(
	v.string('Value must be a string'),
	v.minLength(1, 'This field cannot be empty'),
	v.maxLength(100, 'Value is too long'),
	v.regex(/^[A-Za-z\s]+$/, 'Only English letters and spaces are allowed'),
	v.trim()
)

children.label: VBNumber
children.value:
v.pipe(
  v.number('Value must be a number'),
  v.minValue(0, 'Only digits 0 to 9 allowed'),
  v.maxValue(9, 'Only digits 0 to 9 allowed')
)

children.label: VBPassword
children.value:
v.pipe(
  v.string('Password must be a string'),
  v.minLength(8, 'Password must be at least 8 characters'),
  v.maxLength(100, 'Password is too long'),
  v.regex(/[a-z]/, 'Password must contain a lowercase letter'),
  v.regex(/[A-Z]/, 'Password must contain an uppercase letter'),
  v.regex(/[0-9]/, 'Password must contain a number'),
  v.regex(/[\W_]/, 'Password must contain a special character'),
  v.trim()
)

children.label: VBEmail
children.value:
v.pipe(
  v.string('Email must be a string'),
  v.minLength(1, 'Please enter your email'),
  v.email('Invalid email format'),
  v.maxLength(100, 'Email is too long'),
  v.trim()
)
